meanings.definition: A person who creates and manages a budget.
meanings.sent1: My mom is a budgeters who plans our family finances.
meanings.sent2: The budgeters at the company ensure that expenses stay within limits.
meanings.sent3: The budgeters organized a fun game night with a limited spending cap.
meanings.sent4: She is the budgeters of her friend group, always keeping track of expenses.
meanings.sent5: The budgeters carefully allocated funds for each category to stay on track.

meanings.definition: Those who are skilled in budgeting.
meanings.sent1: The budgeters in our team helped us save money for the project.
meanings.sent2: Experienced budgeters know how to make the most of limited resources.
meanings.sent3: The budgeters shared tips on saving money while still enjoying life.
meanings.sent4: She is a budgeters extraordinaire, always finding ways to cut costs.
meanings.sent5: The budgeters were praised for their ability to manage finances efficiently.

meanings.sent1: Learning about budgeters is important for financial stability.
meanings.sent2: Effective budgeters can help individuals reach their savings goals.
meanings.sent3: The budgeters for the event made sure every dollar was put to good use.
meanings.sent4: She approached budgeters with creativity, finding innovative ways to save.
meanings.sent5: The budgeters involved careful planning and consideration of expenses.
